feed.title: NetBird Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.49.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [management] add transaction for integrated validator groups update and prim acc by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4014
  • [client] Handle lazy routing peers that are part of HA groups by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3943
  • [client] Refactor showLoginURL to improve error handling and connection status checks by @hakansa in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4026
  • [client] close window when process needs to exit by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4027
  • [misc] add additional metrics by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4028
  • [management] check and log on new management version by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4029
  • [misc] Specify netbird binary location in Dockerfiles by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4024
  • [client] Don't open cmd.exe during MSI actions by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4041

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.48.0...v0.49.0

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.50.0
entry.content:
Release Notes for v0.50.0

What's New

Client Enhancements

  • Supported random WireGuard ports to enhance NAT traversal. #4085
  • Implemented DNS routes for Android. #3989
  • Enabled fullstatus output even without probes. #4052
  • Improved route log messages. #4034
  • Used unique sequence numbers for BSD routes. #4081
  • Improved lazy connection detection logic. #4050
  • Avoided logging setup keys in error messages. #3962
  • Login popup now runs in a separate goroutine. #4080

Management Improvements

  • Added network map metric breakdown and reported durations in ms. #4020, #4064
  • Added onboarding logic for account creation. #4084
  • Provided clear error messaging for mismatched logins. #4097
  • Logged user ID on account mismatch. #4101
  • Enabled uniqueness constraint for peer IPs and labels, improving generation performance. #4042
  • Added option to disable default all-to-all policy. #3970
  • Added backward-compatible error handling for setup key registration. #4094
  • Fixed account peer store retrieval by adding locking. #4092
  • Fixed network update test for delete policy. #4086
  • Removed unused database transactions. #4053

Installer & Miscellaneous

  • Fixed wrong default for NETBIRD_AUTH_PKCE_LOGIN_FLAG for self-hosting. #4055
  • Fixed Arch Linux install.sh error with empty dependencies. #4070
  • Now starts the service automatically after installation on Arch Linux. #4071
  • Removed unnecessary port 8080 in getting-started-with-zitadel.sh. #4075
  • Updated sign pipeline version. #4082
  • Added a link to the community forum in documentation. #4093

New Contributors

  • @aliamerj made their first contribution in #3970

Full Changelog: v0.49.0...v0.50.0

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.50.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [client] Fix nil pointer exception in lazy connection by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4109

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.50.0...v0.50.1

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.50.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [management] Add name/ip filters to peer management rest client by @mohamed-essam in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4112
  • [management] Remove deleted user peers from groups on user deletion by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4121
  • Update image in README.md by @braginini in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4122
  • [client] Disable pidfd check on Android 11 and below by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4127
  • [client] Nil check in iface configurer by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4132
  • [client] Update cli description of lazy connection by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4133
  • [management] added cleanupWindow for collecting several ephemeral peers to delete by @crn4 in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4130
  • [client] Add rotated logs flag for debug bundle generation by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4100

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.50.1...v0.50.2

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.50.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • always suffix ephemeral peer name by @pnmcosta in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4138
  • [management] sync calls to UpdateAccountPeers from BufferUpdateAccountPeers by @crn4 in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4137
  • [client] Fix elapsed time calculation when machine is in sleep mode by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/4140

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.50.2...v0.50.3
